name: Champion of the Crypt
description:
You have been invited to challenge the Crypt! Inside the crypt are 6 deadly beasts that have conquered the crypt for years. What secrets lurk inside the crypt? This is your chance to prove yourself and claim the crypt and what lurks inside as your own!

Move with WASD or the arrow keys. Use space to swing your sword.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam 52!

There are some minor graphical glitches in the web version
